چین نے ٹیبل ٹینس میں خاص کامیابی حاصل کی: China achievements in table tennis China success in table tennis

Since 1980 the Table Tennis World Cup has seen 38 champions with 21 of these coming from China. In 1988 table tennis became an Olympic sport. Since then, 13 of the 16 gold medals awarded so far have come to China. In the men's team, 45 players have become world champions.
China achievements in table tennis China success in table tennis

The Beijing Olympics It definitively achieved its goal, winning 48 gold medals to the USA's 36. In table tennis, China won gold, silver and bronze in both the men's and women's singles, and gold in the men's and women's team events. It could not have done any better.

China national badminton team BWF ranking  Best result Champions (1995, 1997, 1999, 2001, 2005, 2007, 2009, 2011, 2013, 2015, 2019, 2021, 2023, 2025) Thomas Cup  Appearances 21 (first in 1982) Best result Champions (1982, 1986, 1988, 1990, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2018, 2024)
China achievements in badminton China badminton success

China has consistently excelled in international badminton competitions, amassing numerous Olympic medals and world championship titles. This success has sparked enthusiasm among a new generation of players, further solidifying badminton's place in the national consciousness.
چین نے ڈائیونگ میں خاص کامیابی حاصل کی ہ: China achievements in diving China success in diving sports
Since the year 2000, China has won 46 out of 56 Olympic gold medals in diving.
China achievements in diving China success in diving sports

Including Thursday's results, China has won 53 of 70 gold medals in diving since the 1984 Los Angeles Olympics, where it won its first. Since the 2008 Beijing Olympics, the country has won 33 of 38 gold medals in the discipline.

China returned to the Olympic games in 1980. Since then, they had demonstrated spectacular performance; accumulating dozens of medals and breaking records.
China achievements gymnastics China success gymnastics
Young gymnasts train at the Li Xiaoshuang Gymnastics School. They are among the latest recruits to China's notoriously demanding state sports system.
China achievements gymnastics China success gymnastics
China topped Japan by over two points, with China's Zhang Boheng surging to the top of the all-around standings (88.597) over Japan's Shinnosuke Oka (86.865).
China achievements gymnastics China success gymnastics
There are provincial programs for gymnastics which train gymnasts starting from a young age, preparing them to enter the national team.
چین نے ویٹ لفٹنگ میں خاص کامیابی حاصل کی: China achievements in weightlifting China success weightlifting

From 1977 to 2024, China won 1048 medals at the IWF World Championships (including 347 in Total only). At the Olympics, the Asian powerhouse also leads operations with 67 podium presences (43 gold, 16 silver, and eight bronze) – medals at the Games only comprise Total results.
China achievements in weightlifting China success weightlifting

"China is the most successful country in the history of our sport," Jalood said in a written interview. "Over the years, Chinese athletes have claimed numerous Olympic and world titles, earning the country a reputation as weightlifting's global powerhouse."
